00027 #include <Geometry/IGeometry.h>
00028 
00029 /// \brief
00030 /// The FdoIGeometricAggregateAbstract class is an aggregate Geometry (abstract) type.
00031 /// FdoIGeometricAggregateAbstract is a single Geometry that is a collection of other geometries.
00032 /// There is no requirement that the geometries interact spatially.
00033 /// Non-abstract derived types should have at least one accessor that returns objects of the appropriate contained type.
00034 class FdoIGeometricAggregateAbstract : public FdoIGeometry
00035 {
00036 public:
00037 
00038     /// \brief
00039     /// Gets the number of Geometries in this collection.  
00040     /// 
00041     /// \return
00042     /// Returns the number of Geometries
00043     /// 
00044     FDO_GEOM_API virtual FdoInt32 GetCount() const = 0;
00045 
00046 protected:
00047     
00048     /// \brief
00049     /// Default destructor.
00050     /// 
00051     /// \return
00052     /// Returns nothing
00053     /// 
00054     FDO_GEOM_API virtual ~FdoIGeometricAggregateAbstract() {};
00055 };
00056 #endif
